Parameters.Name: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response - no accessPolicy in GetAccessProfileList

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Empty AccessProfileList

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 1 AccessPolicy and 1 AccessPoint EntityType = tac:AccessPoint

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 1 AccessPolicy and 1 AccessPoint EntityType is skipped

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 1 AccessPolicy and 1 AccessPoint EntityType = tac:AccessPoint AccessPointInfo token is inconsistent

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 1 AccessPolicy and 1 AccessPoint EntityType is skipped AccessPointInfo token is inconsistent

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 1 AccessPolicy and 1 AccessPoint EntityType = q1:AccessPoint

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 1 AccessPolicy and 1 AccessPoint EntityType = q1:AccessPoint and AccessPointInfo token != AccessPolicy.Entity

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: No response to GetAccessProfileList

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: No response to GetAccessPointInfoList

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 2 access profiles with 1 AccessPolicy each and 2 AccessPoint EntityType = tac:AccessPoint

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 2 access profiles with 1 AccessPolicy each but no 2nd AccessPointInfo

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 2 access profiles with 1 AccessPolicy each and 2 AccessPoint EntityType = tac:AccessPoint

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 2 access profiles with 1 AccessPolicy each and no 2nd AccessPointInfo

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response with 2 access profiles with 1 AccessPolicy each and 2 AccessPoint EntityType = tac:AccessPoint

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-6-1-1 v14.12 ACCESS POLICIES AND ACCESS POINT CONSISTENCY
Test.Name: Correct response - no accessPolicy in GetAccessProfileList
